name: rose~cut diamond necklace
description:
A simple yet beautiful 4mm rose~cut diamond, set in platinum with a fine sparkly platinum chain.

The stone is set in a 'cut down' setting, this is one of the oldest ways to set a stone and was popular in the 1700s.

This piece has been skillfully hand made {not casted} and would make the most stunning present for someone special OR a present for yourself! 

Easy to wear on a daily basis, this is light yet strong and has an unmistakable vintage style!

There is an extension chain so the pendant can be worn at two different lengths.

Fully Hallmarked on the jump-ring.

MEASUREMENTS:
STONE ~ 4mm diameter {5.5mm including setting}
CHAIN ~ 40cm
EXTENSION CHAIN ~ 4.5cm

6.1 x 6.1mm Square Opaque Diamond, 18ct white gold semi-floral engraved & milled edge ring. {shown in size L}

Featuring a stunning Square shape Opaque diamond and hand engraved band. This ring has been entirely handmade by our experienced mounter here in London. This means that every ring is unique.

Opaque & Black diamonds are real and natural parts of the diamond rock. They comprise of many tiny crystalline structures which produce beautiful colours, shapes and textures within each stone. Black diamonds are completely opaque and have a beautiful metalic-like sheen. They have been cut by hand into various shapes and sizes which adds to their unique quality.

Band width: 2.3mm

Our stones are sourced ethically and are conflict free.

Hallmarked inside the ring to show the metal purity. 
*Please note: we are unable to provide a certificate with Opaque & Black Diamonds.

description:

5.95 x 6.03mm White Rose-Cut Diamond, Platinum semi-floral engraved with milled edge ring. {shown in size L}

Featuring a stunning Rose-cut white diamond and hand carved band. This ring has been entirely handmade {as opposed to casted} by our experienced mounter here in London. This means that every ring is unique.

Rose-cut diamonds are an historical cut dating back to the 1400s, they are a different shape to the usual modern cut, as they are flat on the bottom and have a faceted dome on the top, which is said to resemble an opening bud of a rose!

Band width: 2.4mm

description:

name: palladium 4mm milled edge
description:
4mm width, Palladium, hand 'milled' court ring.

A simple and classic plain wedding band.
The shape 'court' means that it is curved on the outside, and slightly curved on the inside too, to give the most comfortable fit.

This design has been hand engraved with a small chisel, to form tiny grains along the edges. The method used to do this has unchanged in hundreds of years and takes a whole life time to learn!

The effect is simple and eye catching.

Each one is finished individually, using Tripoli clay. 
This clay gives a lovely finish which is not too overly shiny.

hallmarked inside the ring to show the metal purity.

All of our wedding rings are made to size, and this ring will be made and dispatched within:

6 weeks.

name: 10 letters of personal engraving
description:
{for up to 10 x LETTERS or NUMBERS}

We can engrave a personal message on the inside or outside {providing it is plain} of your ring.

This will be done by our engraver in the traditional method, using tiny chisels.

There are two fonts to choose from, Script font {which is Italic} or Roman font.

We allow a maximum or 30 characters per ring, and this excludes punctuation and spaces {which are free}.

HOW TO ORDER ENGRAVING:
Select font below and add to your cart...
You can add more quantities of letters when you go through to the cart page.
Engraving requests can be given in the 'Instructions to merchant' box on the payment form, or by emailing us with your engraving request.

Any questions about engraving, please contact us!

*PLEASE SELECT FONT...
